name: Zed Survival
description: Create your character and survive wave after wave of zombies! Gain exp, level up and unlock new skills. Acquire over 20 Weapons with different rarities.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory Storage: 50 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1gb Video Memory Storage: 50 MB available space
